        public boolean subscribe(java.lang.String opcServer,
                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> lstOPCItemPath,
                         int rate)
        Declare an OPC Subscription (locally ) with lstItemPath (only integer type).
        Parameters:
        opcServer - The name of the OPC server connection in which the items reside.
        lstOPCItemPath - A list of strings, each representing an item path, or address to read from.
        rate - Frequency of the subscription
        Returns:
        boolean True if the subscription is right declare
